meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of <radical>righteousness</radical> is the only one who can run this <kanji>ceremony</kanji>. Why? Because it's a very pure ceremony, and only those with an extremely righteous mind can run it.
readingMnemonic: Sadly, the reason only the righteous can run this <kanji>ceremony</kanji> is because it's a punishment ceremony, where he pulls the cord to cut someone's head off via a <reading>gui</reading>llotine (ぎ).
